company_description: Lydia is a mobile payment app that allows users to send and receive money, split bills, and make contactless payments using their smartphones, with additional features for budgeting and financial management.
universities: Universite Cote d'Azur, Paris-Pantheon, ISG Institute Superior de Gestion
embedding_text: Lydia is a mobile payment app that allows users to send and receive money, split bills, and make contactless payments using their smartphones, with additional features for budgeting and financial management.
